title: Chapter 2 - High-Fidelity Rendering in Unity
description: Welcome to Chapter 2 of the Digital Twin educational module! This chapter focuses on Unity for high-fidelity rendering and visualization, which provides the visual component of our digital twin system. Unity enables realistic rendering of robot models, environments, and human-robot interactions that complement the physics simulation provided by Gazebo.

next.title: Unity Installation and Setup for Robotics
